tool_description: Analyzes storage device health using SMART data, bad sector scanning, and performance benchmarks to assess drive condition.

drive_path.description: Storage device path or identifier (e.g., /dev/sda, C:, nvme0n1)

perform_surface_scan.description: Perform surface scan for bad sectors

error_messages: Invalid drive path: Provide a valid drive identifier or path.
Unsupported drive type: Use HDD, SSD, NVMe, or eMMC.
Drive not accessible: Cannot access the specified drive for testing.
SMART data unavailable: Drive does not support SMART monitoring.
usage: Specify drive_path and drive_type. Enable perform_surface_scan to check for bad sectors. Enable benchmark_performance for speed tests.
